CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 26 reads: "Nearly Ten Thousand Pittsburgh and Vicinity Homemakers jammed the walls of beautiful Syria Mosque in Oakland to thrill to three days of dazzling displays, exquisite exhibits, expert food demonstrations and loads of fun and entertainment at the Pittsburgh Courier's fourth annual Home Service Fair, June 22-24...Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Crowd, mostly women, seated on chairs on floor of Syria Mosque with signs for M. Lifsher & Son, Trower Cleaners, and Philco appliance booths in background, for the 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Crowds--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
